titleStmt.title: Divine meditations: or, A honey-comb to refresh weary travellers Being a collection of divine sayings out of the Holy Scriptures of truth. Gathered by G.L.
titleStmt.author: Liddell, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Marshall at the Bible in Grace Church-street, 1700. Where you may be supplied with most of Dr. Owen's, Mr. Mead's, and Mr. Bunyan's work and effigies,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: 1700. Where you may be supplied with most of Dr. Owen's
